channel.title: CVE Feed for ultimatemember -- Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ultimatemember -- Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-8520|2024-10-04T14:03:08.903Z -- ultimatemember -- ultimate%20member%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profile%2C%20registration%2C%20login%2C%20member%20directory%2C%20content%20restriction%20%26%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.8.6. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the admin_init or user_action_hook function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify a users membership status via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-2765|2024-06-06T15:21:52.473Z -- ultimatemember -- ultimate%20member%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profile%2C%20registration%2C%20login%2C%20member%20directory%2C%20content%20restriction%20%26%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Skype and Spotify URL parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.8.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2765|2024-08-01T19:25:41.464Z -- ultimatemember -- ultimate%20member%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profile%2C%20registration%2C%20login%2C%20member%20directory%2C%20content%20restriction%20%26%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Skype and Spotify URL parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.8.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8519|2024-10-04T14:00:48.783Z -- ultimatemember -- ultimate%20member%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profile%2C%20registration%2C%20login%2C%20member%20directory%2C%20content%20restriction%20%26%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The Ultimate Member – User Profile, Registration, Login, Member Directory, Content Restriction & Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'um_loggedin' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.8.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
